title: Shipment: Provide shipping information through partial orders
description:
Description
POT consumers shall be able to get shipment tracking information associated with an order item. The order item structure is in case of order processed by O3 POM defined by partial orders. To have shipment tracking information associated with partial orders POT shall provide access to partial orders through its API. Besides O3 POM total orders, CRM-T and SeCeIT orders O3 POM partial orders shall be retrievable through the same API.
acceptance_criteria: POT API consumers can retrieve O3 POM partial orders from POT
Partial orders are made available by the existing end points
Partial orders have shipment tracking information available
